subject: Remove dangerous capability-keeping logic
commitMessage:
Remove dangerous capability-keeping logic

Change-Id: I840c012a14acb973f6cb64566c4f0b452a84794a
Signed-off-by: Young Ik Cho <youngikcho@gmail.com>

comments.message:
Patch Set 1: Code-Review+2

This looks fine, but I would like to see more information in the change log about why the KEEP_CAPS was there before and what changed to make it no longer necessary.

Patch Set 1: Code-Review+2

We're testing the patches which assign the proper capabilities to the native applications dynamically by the Native app service. It will be added soon, therefore we can apply this first for the security issues.
